name: ov
description:
ov - 15th in "focus" (aa, uu, ff, au, rr, ao, rl, sp, th, ki, ci, sn, lo, ba, ov, sh, fi, do, ru & ti)

What's your best score? ov is all about getting over the record. Tap as fast as you can, anywhere on the screen to get over the world record.

1, 2, 3, or 10 fingers, even get your friends to help - whatever you do, just get over the line.

Thanks for all your support, I hope you're enjoying the "focus" series thus far.

Handmade in Australia,
General Adaptive
